globomart.productcatalogue.controller

Class ProductCatalogueController

  • java.lang.Object
    • globomart.productcatalogue.controller.ProductCatalogueController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/product")
public class ProductCatalogueController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for Product Catalogue where we can do CRUD operations on product
